entities.name: mr malfoy
entities.description: Mr Malfoy is a character in the story who is in a hurry to conduct important business. He is mentioned as saying 'I am in something of a hurry' and 'Come, Draco!'.

entities.name: borgin
entities.description: Borgin is a shopkeeper who is selling objects for sale. He is mentioned as having an oily manner.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is a character in the story who is examining the objects for sale with Mr Malfoy. He is mentioned as pausing to examine a long coil of hangman's rope and reading the card on a necklace.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story who is watching nervously as Draco draws nearer to his hiding place.

relationships.description: Mr Malfoy and Borgin are interacting with each other, with Mr Malfoy saying 'I am in something of a hurry' and 'Come, Draco!'.
Draco is interacting with Mr Malfoy, examining objects for sale together.
Harry is observing Draco as he draws nearer to his hiding place.
